section.p:
The content of 'amplilog2' is a comma-separated file:
ds: date stamp
ts: time stamp
server: guid of the server which is selected in the rack
daemon_id: guid of the daemon who executed the action
key: key to identify the object in the database
namespace: name of the S3 bucket in which the related action is executed
action: name of the action (put, delete, get, ...)
size: size of the object used in the action, expressed in MiB
time: duration of the action
throughput: the throughput for the object's size, expressed in MiB/s
actual_size: used capacity on disk by the object (object size + erasure coding overhead), expressed in MiB
actual_rate: the throughput for the object's "actual_size", expressed in MiB/s
object: name of the object affected by this action
